basics.name: Mattia Spinelli
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Im a full-stack Javascript Developer at Founders and Coders CIC, currently building web and mobile application using NodeJS, React and Cordova/PhoneGap. I'm interested in functional programming and I've been practising it in Javascript mainly, and occasionally in Haskell. After studying electrical engineering I realised that learning C as part of my uni curriculum, was the most fun part of it and I decided to become a developer. I encountered Javascript for the first time 2 and a half years ago and I built an MVP for a startup with it. In June I decided to leave the startup and come to London to learn more about web technologies, and to find challanging project to join.

work.summary: Moogsoft is a startup focused on IT systems event managment. Our product 'Incident' uses AI to cluster allerts and help to manage large distributed IT systems. Among our customers, Yahoo, goDaffy and other.
highlights: I am Helping debugging and improving the product for a  major released, planned in March.
Working with latest framework, such as Vue.js and Rxjs

work.summary: Founders and Coders is a web agency and a coding bootcamp. I am now working as a fullstack developer for FAC customers.
highlights: Build the prototype of a mobile application for the NHS using Cordova/PhoneGap
Built and npm module (audiobuffer-promisified) around HTML5 AudioBuffer

work.summary: I built the prototype for a 3dprinter sharing service. After the project received funding I worked there as CTO. I contracted developers and designer and help to coordinate their work.
highlights: Built a module to analyse .stl fiels and a formula to estimate printing costs
Supervised the developlement of the whole platform

work.summary: This company is an international trader of electrical spare parts. After and initial training phase I worked as Export Area manager.
highlights: Maintain and improve business relationship with out customers in the Middle East
Build a Macro for Windows to automatise data entry

volunteer.summary: Sharing economy blogging platform. I helped them to build this blog and to optimise it on search engines
